page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our class has surveyed around the Shoreham area for the project. Shoreham inports things at the harbour like oil metal and petrol. This town is mainly residential but the downs are very close. The nearest big town is Brighton. On our outing our class was divided up into groups and we surveyed the area. We shared the area with Shoreham First school. They investigated the east, west and north of the area and looked particularly at the airport andthe larger industries.We have looked at the lifestyles of the inhabitants of Shoreham and conducted surveys and interviews.
